reviews.author: B. Siobhan Q. Murphy
reviews.review: Julie brought so much experience & expertise to our buying process in an extremely competitive market.  She had so many great strategies to offer to help us get our offers seen and accepted.  We would never have been able to compete in this market and buy a house without her help.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you very much Siobhan, I appreciate your kind words and repeat business. It is an honor to put my experience to work for you & your family.

reviews.author: Lindley Mease
reviews.review: It was an absolute pleasure to work with Julie. Her work was impeccable from start to finish. Julie not only knew everything about everything, but she also provided the type of care and support that's most needed with this type of decision making. I could not recommend Julie more highly to anyone looking for a new home.
